item.description:
Discussion will be the usual:
opportunity to share information, field questions and discuss a variety of topics related to web development, programming, project management, software, visual design, etc. including CSS and others.

I am going to look into making reservations at Sylvester's, so rsvp early so I can seal the deal.

if you dont have the following info in your profile - put it in or email to me so I can make up a participant list and print out before hand (in a few sentences: brief bio, areas of interest or expertise, and links to your work).

Idea for future is to research or focus on a specific topic - if you like that idea put your comments in your rsvp.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: June Sunday am brunch web developer discussion at Sylvesters
